name: Project BB
description:
- ANNOYING PRIEST AND QUESTS EDITION -

CONTROLS:

  • Some primary and secondary attacks can be charged for higher damage
  • 1/LMB = primary attack
  • 2/RMB = secondary attack (not all weapons)
  • Q = interact
  • E = heal
  • WSAD/Arrows = move
  • Space = jump
  • LShift = dash
  • Esc = Pause
  • O = Quest Log
  • Tab = Passives Menu
  • R = Restart level
  • L = Turn off/on changing direction with mouse
